entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Implement Interface #75760
  • Theoretical race condition in PETypeParameterSymbol (and possibly other locations) #75759
  • Area - Simplify Type Names #75755
  • Area - Naming Style #75754
  • Area - Move Type #75753
  • Area - Signature Help #75751
  • Area - Add Import #75750
  • Area - Change Signature #75749
  • Area - CodeLens #75748
  • Area - Generate Type #75747
  • Area - Rename #75746
  • Area - Extract Method #75745
  • Area - Debugger Integration #75744
  • Area - Edit and Continue #75743
  • Primary Constructor with Self-Type Parameter Creates Uninstantiable Class Without Compiler Error #75742
  • Area - Workspace #75741
  • Area - Navigate To #75740
  • Area - Move Declaration Near Reference #75739
  • Area - MSBuildWorkspace #75738
  • Area - Remove Unused Variable/Values #75737
  • Area - Go To Definition #75736
  • Area - Use Collection Initializer #75735
  • Area - Introduce Variable #75734
  • Area - Generate Constructor #75733
  • Area - Remove Unnecessary Imports #75732
  • Area - Formatting #75731
  • Area - Xml Documentation Comments #75730
  • Area - Find All References #75729
  • Area - Completion #75727
  • Area - Quick Info #75726

Closed

  • Allow my source-generator to run before GeneratedRegex #75762
  • Rename does not work directly after ExtractMethod (with unknown parameter types) #10914
    Backlog
  • Proposal: generate XML doc comments with "Create and initialize property" Quick Action #19479
    Backlog
  • Naming styles options show up in the wrong language if you have multiple languages installed #18340
    Backlog
  • Adding Analyzers Via a Project Reference #18093
    Backlog
  • Using Go to Definition twice, causes a previewed "source as metadata" document to be promoted as an open document #17833
    Backlog
  • CSharpCodeActions.Add Using (fuzzy match) and related fixes after Rename Tracking Is Flakey #17818
    Backlog
  • Regression? Rename and Anonymous Types #17219
    Backlog
  • IDE0032 should not be specified for classes or structs with an explicit `StructLayout` attribute #17201
    Backlog
  • Rename tracking border shown in .cshtml files even though you can't trigger the light bulb #17017
    Backlog
  • Error message when defining named arguments to an implicitly defined tuple #16781
    Backlog
  • Invalid indent guides on else-if with multiline condition #16395
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio deadlocked closing a solution with many documents open #16030
    Backlog
  • Rename via a file that only differs causes an error and results in your changes being reverted #15918
    Backlog
  • Add Xaml, TypeScript and F# IDE tests #14578
    Backlog
  • Bring back Go to Definition Navigation Stack #14496
    Backlog
  • Cancelling a check-out prompt when retargeting portable shows 3 errors #14022
    Backlog
  • VB: Backspacing through identifier doesn't prefer exact matches #13958
    Backlog
  • Move type to file refactoring : detect conflicts ahead of time for Rename type to match file. #13584
    Backlog
  • Wrong number of overloads in QuickInfo #13462
    Backlog
  • Simplify Inline Temporary refactoring for tuples #11028
    Backlog
  • Progression type hierarchy doesn't launch Metadata-as-Source #7151
    Backlog
  • Inline rename shows error squiggles before commiting the change... #10100
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.UnitTests.Progression.InheritsGraphQueryTests.TestSolutionWithMultipleProjects (from Roslyn.VisualStudio.Services.UnitTests) #9653
    Backlog
  • Providing consistent behavior for Rename operation in custom files #9397
    Backlog
  • Consider pattern matching for extract method scenarios #9244
    Backlog
  • Analyzers and code fixes for converting Loop Family #8953
    Backlog
  • DocumentInfo.Create() allows you to create instances with a null TextLoader #7310
    Backlog
  • Analyzer installation script fails to add assemblies with different versions #6322
    Backlog
  • Re-add support for "Surround generated code with #region" option #4939
    Backlog
  • Adding AdditionalFiles Through VS Workspace #4425
    Backlog
  • Code Fix provider not being loaded when just added as an Analyzer in the project file #4330
    Backlog
  • snippet pasting does not honor the indenting mode #4284
    Backlog
  • Feature Request: Signature Help & Quick Info for collection initializers #3529
    Backlog
  • Connect: Cannot disable automatic indenting in Pretty Listing #2509
    Backlog
  • Renaming the default namespace should update the RootNamespace property of the project #2062
    Backlog
  • Remove trailing space after <enter> between arguments (etc.) #940
    Backlog
  • Ignore "Space after method name" option in Razor. #537
    Backlog
  • Code action which selects text #237
    Backlog
  • Adding a #pragma suppression can mess up trivia #228
    Backlog
  • [Regression] Visual Studio becomes unusable if you open large set of VB files #36899
    Backlog
  • Reenable GetHierarchy assertion #36223
    Backlog
  • "Calcualte Code Metrics" should be moved to Analyze sub menu on solution context #31322
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio becomes unresponsive if you attempt open a bunch of C# files #37264
    Backlog
  • VB XML doc inconsistency between template and IntelliSense for property (template contains <returns>, IntelliseSense not) #8627
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense gets confused by aliased references #11310
    Backlog
  • VB: commenting then un-commenting a block of code yields a different end-result #14308
    Backlog
  • Surround with messes the next line when whole lines are selected #36243
    Backlog
  • Brace formatting does not work with "Open Folder" #28553
    Backlog
  • Insert "await" code fix weirdly formats a multi-line lambda #30087
    Backlog
  • Add integration test for #4238 #4269
    Backlog
  • When the editor is in "user read-only" mode, users are offered code fixes that do nothing #4232
    Backlog
  • AdditionalFiles do not show up in CompilationStartAnalysisContext.Options.AdditionalFiles #12840
    Backlog
  • Remove CompilationOutputFilesWithImplicitPdbPath #35065
    Backlog
  • Add a code fix for going from "expression-body member" to "auto-property initializer" and vice versa #27948
    Backlog
  • Context tooltip for indent guides should say more than just "else". #15872
    Backlog
  • Need general IDE integration test that adds a bad piece of metadata so we can ensure that all metadata related features are resilient. #19412
    Backlog
  • New Feature Proposal: GoTo Type #2505
    Backlog
  • Lightbulb fails to drop down for specific Visual Basic constants #26674
    Backlog
  • Suggest to add/remove the 'in' parameter modifier #26657
    Backlog
  • Work we can add later for ForeachToFor refactoring #25667
    Backlog
  • Do not suggest overloads hidden by hidebyname #22009
    Backlog
  • selection doesn't work after deleting a character #23894
    Backlog
  • Should be able to specify two naming styles for a given symbol #23707
    Backlog
  • C# Code Containing LINQ Incorrectly Formatted When Using Surround With Snippet #23142
    Backlog
  • Undeclared compilation errors should fail analyzer/fixer tests #21550
    Backlog
  • Feature request: .editorconfig supports commas at end of certain members #21151
    Backlog
  • [Question] Using custom Roslyn dlls under custom built VS Next #20538
    Backlog
  • VB new preselection should not include the current error type #20461
    Backlog
  • Code Structure - Extend behavior to other structure components like paranthesis #17441
    Backlog
  • Extension methods, shouldn't show as extensions when accessed through static methods #16382
    Backlog
  • Support VS Editor Completion List tabs #14021
    Backlog
  • Add using for assembly attribute can introduce error with existing attribute in AssemblyInfo.cs #11755
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices should Embed Interop Types to VSLangProj #7292
    Backlog
  • Support surround with in VB #6538
    Backlog
  • Inline temp for an array literal with anonymous types in the initializer doesn't work #3315
    Backlog
  • Documentation missing for Workspace DocumentContext/RelatedDocuments #355
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35505.08 #75723

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder (#724… #75761
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Have the naming style fixer understand the 'I' pattern for interfaces better #75758
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve pattern matching when user is likely providing camel humps #75757
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Modify segmented list to grow by growth rate. #75756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Parse directives in trailing trivia as skipped tokens trivia #75724
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • VB: Recognize and check an `unmanaged` constraint #75665
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next
  • Allow renaming with overload resolution when there is only one overload #75752
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support navigating to metadata in progression results #75728
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add wrapper service broker to allow for easy MEF consumption #75717
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Also check if reference is isolated file reference for completion providers #75721
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use absolute path for CompilerGeneratedFilesOutputPath #75713
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Bind lambda in object initializer despite errors #75695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement support for triggering Fix All from additional files #74695
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Prototype string literals in data section #75557
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify Capacity growth rate to be linear instead of doubling on resize. #75708
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
